problem_text: 6.51. Let F be a local subformation of some formation X of finite groups and let Ω be the set of all maximal homogeneous X-screens of F. Find a way of constructing the elements of Ω with the help of the maximal inner local screen of F. What can be said about the cardinality of Ω? For definitions see (L. A. Shemetkov, Formations of finite groups, Moscow, Nauka, 1978 (Russian)). L. A. Shemetkov
